lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis, accused of doping during his Tour de France victory in July, had right hip surgery Wednesday. The two-hour procedure, performed by Dr. David Chao in San Diego, revealed greater damage to Landis’s hip than initially shown in previous exams, a spokesman said in a statement.
